title: Which are the best blogs for technological innovation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends what kind of technology you're talking about. For general technology, Lifehacker is a great website. For all things to do with Android, Android Authority will suit your needs. And for things like OSes, How-to-Geek is a great resource.

Best blogs to stay updated with latest technological innovations; Technowize Magazine - Product Reviews, Technology News & Tech Events Ars Technica CNET - Product reviews, how-tos, deals and the latest tech news Digital Trends - Digital Trends | Technology News and Product Reviews Engadget GigaOM - The industry leader in emerging technology research Gizmodo - We come from the future. Mashable ReadWrite | The leading Internet of Things News Platform The Next Web - TNW - International technology news, business and culture The Verge TechCrunch TechRadar - The source for tech buying advice
